ing: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
des: "Children love these rich, frozen, fudgy treats! Make some for your Fourth of July celebration."
ins: In a mixing bowl, combine pudding, sugar, and milk. Pour mixture into small plastic cups (if you do not have ice pop molds) and freeze. When set, place a wooden craft sticks into them if you are using plastic cups. Serve when frozen.
